## TYPE2GL variable

Potentially lossy conversion from `Type` to `GLType` enums.

Not all enums are mappable:

- `F64` maps to `undefined`<!-- -->, since unsupported by WebGL - `U8C` maps to U8

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
TYPE2GL: Record<Type, GLType | undefined>
```
